sentences.english: Pedro and Hanna are looking for an apartment
Apartment advertisement
FOR RENT
rent 870 €/month + water fee 14 €/person/month
2 rooms + kitchen + balcony
Puistotie 20, Helsinki
Well-maintained bright two-room apartment in an apartment building in Lehtelä.
Peaceful location on Puistotie in a pleasant area.

sentences.finnish: 3. kerros, ei hissiä. Asunnossa on pieni parveke.
sentences.english: 3rd floor, no elevator. The apartment has a small balcony.
The large kitchen has space for a dining table.
Sauna and laundry room are in the basement.
Parking spaces in the front yard.
Available 1.9. Rent guarantee 2 months' rent.
Inquiries by email.
Landlord Heikki Jussila, hpjussila@netbox.fi

sentences.finnish: Pedro: Hanna, katso, tämä näyttää hyvältä!
sentences.english: Pedro: Hanna, look, this looks good!
Hanna: Is it a two-room apartment?
Pedro: Yes, it is. 45 square meters.
Hanna: Where is it located?

sentences.finnish: Pedro: Öö, odota, minä katson... Tämä on Lehtelässä, Puistotiellä. Eikö se ole ihan kiva alue?
sentences.english: Pedro: Umm, wait, I'll check... This is in Lehtelä, on Puistotie. Isn't it a quite nice area?

sentences.finnish: Hanna: Joo on! Lehtelässä menee juna keskustaan.
sentences.english: Hanna: Yes, it is! There's a train to the city center from Lehtelä.
How much is the rent?
Pedro: 870 euros plus water fees.
Hanna: Oh wow, terribly expensive!

sentences.finnish: Pedro: Niin on, mutta mennäänkö silti katsomaan?
sentences.english: Pedro: It is, but shall we still go and look?

sentences.finnish: Hanna: Mennään vaan. Milloin siellä on näyttö?
sentences.english: Hanna: Let's just go. When is the viewing?

sentences.finnish: Pedro: En minä tiedä. Tässä on vain sähköpostiosoite.
sentences.english: Pedro: I don't know. There's only an email address here.

sentences.finnish: Hanna: Okei, no täytyy sitten kirjoitta ja kysyä.
sentences.english: Hanna: Okay, well I'll have to write and ask.
